thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 21 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Everbridge Q4 Non-Gaap Loss Per Share $0.02

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Everbridge Q4 Non-Gaap Loss Per Share $0.02
text:
Feb 21 (Reuters) - Everbridge Inc:
* EVERBRIDGE ANNOUNCES FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS
* Q4 NON-GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.02
* Q4 GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.20 * Q4 REVENUE ROSE 37 PERCENT TO $29.2 MILLION * SEES Q1 TOTAL REVENUE $29.4 MILLION TO $29.7 MILLION; SEES FY 2018 REVENUES $135.6 MILLION - $137.1 MILLION
* SEES Q1 GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.43-$0.44; SEES FY 2018 GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $1.56-$1.60
* SEES Q1 NON-GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.20-$0.21; SEES FY 2018 NON-GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.58-$0.61 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
